title: If you're silver, don't feel superior
body:
The new season changes has apparently made it a lot easier for new accounts to get into silver than last season, so many of the people with new accounts that made it to silver are the same skill level as people who were placed into bronze last year and stayed in bronze. Also, in silver you don't decay, so you could have won 2 out of 10 placement matches (which is apparently how much you need to get into silver Season 5), you needed 5 placement wins last year to get silver, and not played to stay silver

If they played more rankeds, I think that many of those silvers will drop into bronze just like the rest of us
